name: Revoluna
description:
The god of the sun has released his beasts. Brazil has been forced to face it’s legends. There is only one who can stop them. 

You are Colt Capoeira, a festival performer whose knack for the arcane has earned him favour from the mysterious Jaci. With the power of the moon on your side, fight back the creatures of myth and reclaim Brazil from forest to favela. Uncover the culture as you unlock new abilities and challenge the supernatural in this high-octane first-person shooter that is riddled with challenges. So, when the enemies are at your door and you find yourself desperate…

Dance like your life depends on it.

**PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS A PROTOTYPE FOR AN IDEA THAT MAY COME TO PASS IF GIVEN ENOUGH SUPPORT**
